subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot his second consecutive 66 to take a four-shot lead Friday at the British Open. Tiger Woods made the cut when he sank a pressure putt for a birdie on the 18th.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot his second consecutive 66 to take a four-shot lead Friday at the British Open. Tiger Woods made the cut when he sank a pressure putt for a birdie on the 18th.
